post.regular-title: Issue with menu item links in Joomla bulk content importer
post.regular-body:
I’m using the Bulk Import plugin for Joomla 1.5. Currently just testing with the sample file. When I upload hello-world-import.txt the articles and menu items are created, but the menu item links are broken.

Initially the links have the form “index.php?Itemid=148&option=” This leads to a 404. Also 148 is the database ID of the menu item, not the ID of the article it should be linking to.

If I open the menu item through the Joomla Admin interface and inspect the link, it shows as “index.php?option=com_content&view=article&id=120” which is correct. I then save the menu item without making any changes and now the link works. Thing is that I don’t want to do that for every imported article.

joomla/administrator/components/com_bulkimport/models/content.php line 58:

$row->link = 'index.php?option=com_content&view='.$taskLink.'&id='. $id;

Shows the correct structure, there are no instances of “Itemid” in the module’s code.
